title: 19: OBITCH unclaimed boner!
description:
Perhaps one of our more….graphic episodes this week Spencer and Madison sit down to discuss death erections, unclaimed bodies, an obituary for a badass, and so much more! Apologies in advance for what you’re about to listen to! 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
Olive & June: Oliveandjune.com/obit code ‘obit’ for 20% off your first mani system! 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unidentified_decedent#:~:text=A%20body%20may%20go%20unidentified%20due%20to%20death,advanced%20state%20of%20decomposition%20or%20major%20facial%20injuries https://www.talkdeath.com/this-is-what-happens-to-unclaimed-bodies-in-america/ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tnm2v4Ul24Y https://www.nytimes.com/2021/10/06/technology/robert-schiffmann-dead.html?searchResultPosition=10 https://nypost.com/2018/06/14/cops-say-man-asked-them-to-test-his-meth-after-violent-reaction/ https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2021/09/17/alone-death/#:~:text=There%20are%20no%20official%20statistics%20about%20how%20many,tens%20of%20thousands%20of%20lives%20end%20this%20way https://news.softpedia.com/news/Dead-Men-Can-Really-Have-Erection-Sometimes-They-Ejaculate-too-77649.shtm https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5055911/
https://www.iflscience.com/editors-blog/boner-of-an-executed-18thcentury-man-goes-on-display/
https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/priapism/symptoms-causes/syc-20352005
See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
